channel.title: Blogs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Making of a Website
item.description: The Making of A Website Websites and Social Media In the early days of the internet, years before I would use it at all, it was commonplace to have personal websites. Then I am told came social media sites. They provided an easier way to get your thoughts out into the world. No code, markup, or page design is needed; just write and get directly to sharing. This came with a big boom in popularity for the internet in general as well as these sites in particular; to not use them was to become irrelevant, at least in the eyes of the net.
